attributes.action: Take the threat of ‘No Deal’ off the table!
attributes.additional_details: That’s why, I call on the government to stop threatening us with no deal, take the threat of ‘No deal’ off the table and try and give us more of choice, so that we can decide which would be the best for this country.
attributes.background: We’ve been told time and time again that the deal negotiated with the EU is the best deal.  Actually, it’s not, it’s a very bad deal and if we say no to this deal, we’ be leaving on the 29th March without a deal.
